Text: Why is it a rar archive!! It just wastes my space when i have to extract the archive to my hdd! that is if i decide mto keep seeding. its just stupid!
I don't know why is in RAR but I know that is NOT fake one! :)

Thnaks so much for the up, but please do not rar the files. Nobody wants that, its a wate of hd space and people with low diskspace might not seed after finishing up because the have to delete the rar to dl more...
Grr! Even VLC, which is supposed to be able to play uncompressed RARs, is only able to the very first part and then it mysteriously dies. scene, indeed. You do know about SRR, right?
